item.title: Notes on writing an R package
item.description: Some of my own experience On description Namespace load vs attach Documentation Potential problems when checking the package Some nice suggestions from the CRAN editors when submitting the package Although ‘SHAPforxgboost’ is not a package too complicated, it took me some time to get the package pass all the cran check. Now (Aug.03,2019) it is available on cran. Install by either install.packages("SHAPforxgboost") or

item.title: SHAP for XGBoost in R: SHAPforxgboost
item.description: SHAP package in R Why SHAP values Local Explanation Consistency in Global Feature Importance SHAP plots Summary plot Dependence plot Interaction effects SHAP force plot References SHAP package in R I built an R package SHAPforxgboost that wraps all the R plotting functions illustrated in this post. It serves for now as the vignette for the package. Please install from cran or Github page.
